Class EMLHandler

java.lang.Object
org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
nl.hva.elections.xml.utils.xml.EMLHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
TagAndAttributeNames, ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class EMLHandler extends DefaultHandler implements TagAndAttributeNames
This EMLHandler is a SAX2 event handler that is being called by a SAX2 parser while it is processing an EML-XML file. It supports three different file types.
  • A file containing the structure or hierarchy of the election
  • A file containing the candidates lists
  • A file containing the results from polling stations, municipalities, constituencies and the national level
Depending on the exact tag that is being processed one of the registerXxx methods from one of the transformers is being called.
The EMLHandler puts the values of tags and attributes in a Mapinvalid input: '&ltString', String> called electionData. How the values are put into this map depends on the fact if a tag has attributes or not. Values are only put into the map if there actually is a value. For tags without attributes the tag-name is used as the key. For tags with attributes, the attribute name is prefixed with the tag-name to form the key.
Some tags need special processing. This can be done as soon as the start-tag is being parsed or when the closing-tag is parsed. If and what exactly depends on the specific tag. Some tags are repeated in which case just as soon as the open tag is parsed the current state of electionData is saved on a stack. And once the closing tag is being parsed the state is popped off the stack. This ensures that each repeated tag has a clean sleight when it is being processed.
Incase an unknown tag or attribute is being processed this will be reported through standard error stream.

NOTE: There are some TODO's present that need fixing!

    • EMLHandler

      public EMLHandler(CandidateTransformer candidateTransformer)
      Creates an EML Handler that can process candidates list files. For each candidate that it finds it calls the registerCandidate on the provided candidateTransformer.
      Parameters:
      candidateTransformer - the CandidateTransformer that handles the transformation of the provided data into the data model.

    • EMLHandler

      public EMLHandler(DefinitionTransformer definitionTransformer)
      Creates an EML Handler that can process the election definition files.
      Parameters:
      definitionTransformer - the DefinitionTransformer that handles structural election data.

    • EMLHandler

      public EMLHandler(RegionTransformer regionTransformer)
      Creates an EML Handler that can process region data.
      Parameters:
      regionTransformer - the RegionTransformer that handles the transformation of region data.

    • EMLHandler

      public EMLHandler(VotesTransformer votesTransformer)
      Creates an EML Handler that can process votes files. For each party and candidate that it finds it calls the appropriate registerXxxVotes or the registerMetadataon the provided VotesTransformer.
      Parameters:
      votesTransformer - the VotesTransformer that handles the transformation of the provided data into the data model.
